name: Growing Place Family Preschool And Parenting Center
description: Growing Place Family Preschool (GPFP) is a non-profit preschool based in San Francisco, California that serves families with children two to five years of age. The program is divided into age groups: 2's, 3's and Pre-K (4's and 5's).
fullDescription: Growing Place Family Preschool (GPFP) is a non-profit preschool based in San Francisco, California that serves families with children two to five years of age. The program is divided into age groups: 2's, 3's and Pre-K (4's and 5's).
